title: Spectator mode not working.
body: i tried spectator mode on new client, as well as on legacy. Spectate option is avaliable but every time i click it i get the loading circle instead of mouse button, and a black screen, after a while it says "spectator mode failed"

replies.body: This is known issue that we're currently investigated for a fix.  An update has been posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune) page in the meantime.  Hang tight until it's resolved!
